definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
when everybody gathers fuel, the flames are higher (idiom)/the more people, the more strength
pinyin: zhong4 ren2 shi2 chai2 huo3 yan4 gao1

sentences.english: They had sawn up the fallen tree, so they had a good store of firewood.
sentences.chinese: 他们把那棵倒下的树锯断了，因此贮存了丰富的柴火。

sentences.english: Of poverty is the wood fire.
I stopped at the woodshed and picked several sticks of wood.
sentences.chinese: 我到柴火间里取了些木柴。

sentences.english: There is no fire in the grate, and hunger has made him faint.
sentences.chinese: 壁炉里没有柴火，饥饿又弄得他头昏眼花。

sentences.english: I am so busy that I can't help to cut the wood into pieces.
sentences.chinese: 我太忙了而不能帮你忙把这些木头劈成柴火。

sentences.english: It particularly is the place that can depend fuel to roast fish in this.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是在这个只能靠柴火烤鱼的地方。

sentences.english: The narrow steep Wong Road, an old man carrying firewood in the middle of the road.
sentences.chinese: 狭窄陡峭的黄泥路，一位老人背着柴火走在路中间。

sentences.english: A pot of new barley seeds is buried under the pyre for roasting.
sentences.chinese: 一罐子大麦种子被埋于柴火下进行烘焙。

sentences.english: Because the Indians are gathering firewood like crazy!
sentences.chinese: 因为印第安人正疯狂地收集柴火。

sentences.english: It landed on a pile of firewood where the yellow yolk burst into flames.
sentences.chinese: 鸟蛋掉到一堆柴火上，蛋黄随即迸发出黄色的火焰。

sentences.english: We can't light the fire as the firewood is wet.
sentences.chinese: 因为柴火潮湿，所以点不着。

sentences.english: She scavenged for firewood with one of her five children near the pits of excrement.
sentences.chinese: 她与五个儿女之一在粪坑附近捡拾柴火。

sentences.english: With his profits from selling the flowers and the firewood, the man opened up a refreshment shop.
sentences.chinese: 行人用卖花和柴火所赚的钱开了一家小食店。

sentences.english: Dropped the bag firewood, years, there are always countless leaves.
sentences.chinese: 丢下书包，去拾柴火，荔枝林里，总有数不清的落叶。

sentences.english: David split a stack of logs.
This material is known as stover.
sentences.chinese: 这种物质通常被用作柴火。

definition: to light a fire for cooking
to make a fire/to light a fire
large kitchen stove made from bricks or earth/(PRC) ordinary mess hall (lowest dining standard, ranked below 中灶[zhong1 zao4] for mid-level cadres and 小灶[xiao3 zao4] for the most privileged)
